t: TriStar Pictures - Wikipedia
s: 3 weeks ago - TriStar Pictures, Inc. (spelled as Tri-Star until 1991) is an American film studio and production company that is a member of the Sony Pictures Motion Picture Group, part of the Japanese conglomerate Sony Group Corporation. It is a corporate sibling of fellow Sony studio, Columbia Pictures.
